RADIO STATION KUSD
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
VERMILLION
March 7* 1956
TO: John Holt, network Manager
Waldo Abbot
John Regnell
Hugh Mix
FROM: Jim Slack
SUBJECT : “The People Take The Lead'1
%
Think that we have a good series here. The acting
was fine and the script above average. Too often
program making a plea for racial and religious
tolerance end up with a long and dull collection of
pious platitudes. I was a little surprised to find
such wide tolerance among the members of a single
fraternity house but otherwise the program was quite
creditable. I was also impressed with the point of
view which did not claim that the problem was solved.
Certainly there is still much to be done. I vote
“yes“•
Good luck to you, John, in New York
